segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment by which the sender must uniquely identify the Statement of Account.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates, and when relevant, the times related to the whole message. The segment must be specified at least once to specify the message date as allocated by the sender.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment for referencing documents which relate to the whole message.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the currency of the Statement of Account. The payment currency is the default currency for all amounts, it must be specified in international transactions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the transaction and, optionally the contact points and numbers.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a party name and address, either by coded identification or in clear form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the contact person or department for a trading party and specifying the communication channel and number.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department and their function, to whom communications should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation:
COM, A segment specifying the communications channel and number for the specified contact.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments providing details of all documents, e.g. invoices, credit notes, etc., to which the Statement of Account refers. It contains details of the monetary values associated with the documents and of relevant dates. There must be at least one occurrence of this group within the Statement of Account Message.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying the reference document against which payment is to be made.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the required amounts for the referenced document e.g. amount due, discount amount, payment amount.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date of the referenced document and to indicate any other relevant dates applicable, e.g. Due date, Tax point date, etc.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation:
RFF, A segment for the inclusion of any additional references related to the reference document.
4.1.3 Summary section
Information to be provided in the Summary section:

segment.name: Section control
segment.documentation: UNS, A service segment placed at the start of the summary section to avoid segment collision.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the total amount pertaining to the message. The outstanding balance amount is mandatory and is taken as given, i.e. it is not subject to recalculation.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information, in coded or clear form.
